posts.post_content:
The thing with Public Execution that made it great in limited was the "I'ma kill this guy. You all best behave, now". It was the closest thing black had to [Fog](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fog).  
  
Do you remember [Mental Agony](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mental Agony)? Do you remember how dangerous discarding was in a draft? No?   
  
Then Assassin's Strike won't even see limited play.
